A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was not great. Many were expecting for an impossible perfect movie. I really liked the movie. Even though it was just good\, it is still better than most movies out there. It is probably my favorite SW movie after the original trilogy.  It is not worth 5 stars but I have to give it 5 to counter attacks the idiots out there giving it just 1 out of spite....
